content:
Leichter family

1 Isaac LEICHTER                     1769 - before 1827 (Mayer) {census family 185}
 + Perel                             1773 - 1837 #92 (Pincus)

    * Isaac SCHAMROTH                1794-95 - Sep 24, 1837 #292
